Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization for the town of Wallkill to adopt a hotel or motel tax of up to 5%
Summary: Extends the authorization for the town of Wallkill to adopt a hotel or motel tax of up to 5%.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 373 of the laws of 2020 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the town of Wallkill to adopt a hotel or motel tax of up to 5%, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
